answerText: Unforgettable[10] Montgomery is best known for playing the detective Samantha Spade on several seasons of this other CBS drama that starred Anthony LaPaglia as the head of a Missing Persons Unit.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 4 | 19 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: For 10 points each, name some things related to the acting career of Poppy Montgomery: [10] Poppy Montgomery stars in this CBS series as Carrie Wells, a woman with perfect memory who helps the police solve crimes in order to try and eventually figure out her own sister's murder.
